title: One Direction's New Single Is 'Perfect' - See The Artwork!
text: One Direction just announced their seconds single and it’s “Perfect”! The four piece band — Harry Styles, Liam Payne, Louis Tomlinson and Niall Horan — shared the news after their concert in Glasgow, Scotland on Thursday night (October 8). “Our next single is called ‘Perfect’. Looking forward to you hearing it, hope that you like [...] »
